about.title: About me
description: Hello! I joined the digital world and found my vocation for BackEnd development as well as automation and system and architecture administration (DevOps).
Architecture, automation and scripting (DevOps) - Docker / Shell / CI&CD / Python
If you want to know more, I am fond of personal project development and I will be delighted to present them to you!

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.description:
TMA and Gradle/Maven module development for Liferay 7 / 7.4. 
Liferay Database Upgrade and Data Integration. 
Environment preparation and experience in DevOps. 
Integration into a developer team assigned to the entire chain of an IT project. 
Development of an anonymization tool for a Liferay database.
experiences.competences: Talend / Java / Liferay / Docker / Kubernetes / Python / SCRUM

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.description:
Development of a plug-in for the LMS (Learning Management System) Moodle in order to view medical imaging studies (DICOM). 
Development of a presentation website. 
Proposal for an optimization of the downloading of a DICOM study for the Orthanc Server.
experiences.competences: PHP / ReactJS / Orthanc Server / C - C++ / Moodle / Docker

experiences.title: Website development
experiences.description: Development of a website with the PHP Symfony 6 framework. Planning management tool and pay slip printing for childminder.

experiences.title: Computer Night
experiences.description:
Participation in the night of computing. A national competition that brings together students, teachers and companies to work together on the development of a web application. 
Year 2020: 1st and 3rd prize. 
Year 2021: 2nd et 3rd price.

experiences.title: Suite ELK
experiences.description: School project for a whole year on the development of a data visualization application with the ELK suite. State of the art / ElasticSearch / Logstash / Kibana.

experiences.title: Civic Service
experiences.description: Civic service in parallel with my studies for a period of 8 months. Intervention, follow-up of disabled athletes in competition and leisure, social and human contact, logistics.

schools.description: Mastère Expert en Développement Logiciel, Mobile & IoT
